LightningComponentBundle.description: Expose beautiful Chart.js chart using Lightning Web Component in the App Builder

property.label: Type
property.description: Define the chart type

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Define the chart title

property.name: legendPosition
property.label: Legend Position
property.description: Define where the legend will be displayed

property.name: styleCss
property.label: CSS Style
property.description: Provide inline custom css style for chart container

property.name: colorPalette
property.label: Color palette to use
property.description: Choose the slds color palette to use (https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/guidelines/charts/#Chart-Color)

property.name: fill
property.label: Fill the chart ?
property.description: Check this property fo fill the chart

property.name: detailsLabels
property.label: Dataset Labels
property.description: Display the label for each values set in the dataset in a JSON array of string

property.name: details
property.label: Dataset
property.description: Define the chart values in a JSON array of object

property.name: soql
property.label: SOQL
property.description: Define a SOQL to be used to fetch the data (only aggregate query). Use label alias for the label and value alias for the value
property.placeholder: SELECT StageName label, SUM(Amount) value FROM Opportunity WHERE IsClosed = false AND AccountId = :recordId WITH SECURITY_ENFORCED GROUP BY StageName LIMIT 10

property.name: handler
property.label: Custom Data Provider
property.description: Define the Custom Data Provider class hander name to fetch the data. It must extends "ChartDataProvider"
